channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2023110312
item.description:
Report X-2023110312

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-02
  • City: LANSING
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER ARRIVED TO LEAKING HAZMAT PACKAGE WAS NEAR REAR OF TRAILER WITH ARROWS UP AND LEAKING OUT BOTTOM.

item.title: Report X-2023110162
item.description:
Report X-2023110162

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-23
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The drum was discovered to be leaking when unloading from a trailer and brought to QA. DescribePack: There is a puncture hole near the bottom of the drum allowing contents to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The drum was placed in a salvage drum to contain the leak.

item.title: Report X-2023101317
item.description:
Report X-2023101317

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-17
  • City: STERLING HEIGHTS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was loaded to the vehicle, it was then noticed that there was a few drips coming from the bottom corner of the box. The package was removed from the vehicle, the drips were cleaned with a spill pad and the package was given to QA. DescribePack: there is a hairline crack in the body of the jug inside DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: the package was placed in a bag and spill pad lined tote and taken to QA

Report X-2023101315

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: pail was dented due to handling, upon sending it up the induct a leaking was found, absorbent pads were used and pail was put into a drum to prevent more leakage DescribePack: seal broke due to dent DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: absorbent pads

item.title: Report X-2023101117
item.description:
Report X-2023101117

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-12
  • City: PORTAGE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: van line manager informed me of a leaking hazmat at the top of the van line. Package was placed into a red hazmat tote and inspected DescribePack: one of the caps had a crack in it that led to the inner packaging leaking DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: placed with the orientation arrows facing the proper direction

item.title: Report X-2023101040
item.description:
Report X-2023101040

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-12
  • City: GRAND RAPIDS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WET UNMARKED BOX WAS PUT IN A HAZMAT TOTE AND BROUGHT IT OVER FOR INSPECTION. UPON INSPECTION IT WAS FOUND TO BE A DAMAGED HAZMAT AND THE HAZMAT PROCESS WAS STARTED. DescribePack: CAN HAS A SMALL DENT AND PUNCTURE HOLE IN THE CORNER OF THE SIDEWALL CAUSING IT TO LEAK. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: CAN WAS TURNED ON THE SIDE TO AVOID THE PRODUCT COMING IN CONTACT WITH THE PUNCTURE HOLE.

item.title: Report X-2023100964
item.description:
Report X-2023100964

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: We received one 5-gallon bucket of acetic acid with some slight leakage from underneath the lid. QA was notified when damage was discovered, and the item was placed in a plastic bag and bin. DescribePack: light amount of leakage from under the lid DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA was notified when damage was discovered, and the item was placed in a plastic bag and bin.

item.title: Report X-2023100958
item.description:
Report X-2023100958

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: PORTAGE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was found in a trailer during the unload process. Hazmat was found with liquid around the lid. Hazmat was taking by QA and placed in a red hazmat tote and then taken to the Hazmat cage. Upon inspection it was found that the lid had a bad seal for the lid causing the leakage. DescribePack: Seal inside lid was not working properly. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Immediately taken to Hazmat cage upon locating the hazmat.
